alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:51AM CDT until June 06 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR GARFIELD COUNTY... At 151 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vance Air Force Base, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Enid, Waukomis, Lahoma, Drummond, Breckenridge, Fairmont, Carrier, Vance Air Force Base, Bison and North Enid. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
